passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > ul:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > li > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(6) > div:nth-child(2) > div > h2
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(1) > ul:nth-child(2) > li:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(1) > ul:nth-child(2) > li:nth-child(2) > h3:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div > ul > li > a > h3:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div > ul > li > a > h3:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(3) > div > ul > li > a > h3:nth-child(2)
